Dangerous ingredients to watch out for in a cough syrup, warns FDA
description: Millions rely on cough syrups, but some ingredients pose serious risks. Codeine, a narcotic, can lead to addiction and death. Dextromethorphan, while safe in doses, is abused for hallucinogenic effects. Promethazine causes severe drowsiness and respiratory issues, especially in children. Diphenhydramine can trigger heart problems and seizures. Diethylene glycol, an industrial chemical, is highly toxic and can be fatal.

description: Astronomers are stunned by interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS releasing water vapor unusually far from the Sun. The discovery offers vital insights into how life's building blocks travel across the galaxy, highlighting the diverse origins of planetary materials.

title: 'Strange cure attempt': Chinese woman swallows 8 live frogs for back pain
description: An 82-year-old woman in China swallowed eight live frogs to treat back pain, a local folk remedy. She was later hospitalized with severe abdominal pain and diagnosed with parasites, including sparganum, due to the ingestion. Doctors warn against such practices, citing potential health risks.

title: Telangana bus fare hike: BRS working president KT Rama Rao put under house arrest

title: THE World University Rankings 2026: Oxford leads again as US universities decline
description: The University of Oxford tops the THE World University Rankings 2026 for the tenth year running, while US universities show signs of decline amid political and funding pressures. Asia’s elite universities stall after years of rapid progress, though wider regional growth continues. The UK maintains strength at the top but faces challenges in lower-ranked institutions. Demographic shifts and policy constraints signal ongoing change in the global higher education landscape, as detailed by Times Higher Education.

Further discussions are expected.

description: The Supreme Court overturned the death sentence of a man convicted of rape and murder, stating the police made him a scapegoat. The court found the prosecution failed to prove the case beyond a reasonable doubt, highlighting a lack of credible evidence and questioning the authenticity of CCTV footage.

He reminded supporters that leadership changes are natural in cricket and urged them to support the new captain as he embarks on this new chapter.

description: New research suggests weight loss jabs like GLP-1s could affect cancer scans. These drugs might make scans appear abnormal, leading to unnecessary tests. Experts also found these jabs could reduce the effectiveness of breast cancer chemotherapy. Doctors now emphasize reviewing patient history before treatments. More studies are needed on these drugs' impact. Read below to know more about this!

title: Amazon founder Bezos: I always advise to young people, 'Go work at ...'

He emphasizes that such roles teach crucial skills like responsibility, discipline, and customer interaction, which are vital for long-term success and often overlooked in the pursuit of rapid startup growth.
